code: var editPostReducer=function editPostReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'EDITPOST':state=action.up;state[action.indx].text=action.nt;return state;default:return state;}};export default editPostReducer;
